message: We soon find a metal door slightly ajar. Koujaku peers through the crack, hugging the wall.

name: 紅雀
message: "I have some of my guys waiting nearby just in case. We don't know how many are in there."
On our way over, we decided that Koujaku, Mink, Clear, and I will be going inside.
Meanwhile, Noiz will monitor the local network and erase any logs of our intrusion.
Noiz steps back, then goes to work on his Coil.
